docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: One method of cutting medical costs is to ration services. Robert H. Blank, author of the book ''Rationing Medicine,'' and associate director of the program for biosocial research at Northern Illinois University, talked with the Business Forum editor, Joel Kurtzman, about some of the choices society must make to contain medical costs.
